SEARCH
Package controller

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
controller.SessionController
controller.UserController
public class UserController extends SessionController
Represents the controller for a user in the medical system. Manages user-related tasks such as login, password change, and accessing role-specific menus.

  • Method Details

    • login

      public boolean login(String inputID, String inputPassword)
      Simulates user login by validating user ID and password.
      Parameters:
      inputID - The user ID entered by the user
      inputPassword - The password entered by the user
      Returns:
      true if login is successful, false otherwise
